Class TheGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • TheGrid

  • public class TheGrid
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BOMB
      the integer representing the bomb in the grid
      static java.awt.Color COLORBG
      the color of the background
      static java.awt.Color COLORBOMB
      the color of the bomb tile when clicked
      static java.awt.Color COLORFG
      the color of the rectangles
      static int HIDE
      the integer we use to hide the number
      static int SHOW
      the integer we use to show the number
      if the number we show is zero, nothing will be shown
      static boolean TESTING
      TESTING FLAG
      if set to true, the value of the grid will be displayed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TheGrid()
      The default constructor
      Will create a 5x4 grid with 5 bombs and a margin of 5 pixels between the rectangles
      TheGrid(int r, int c, int nb, int m)
      Create the grid and randomly place given number of bombs in the grid.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      draws the grid onto the screen
      int getCols()
      returns the number of columns in the grid
      int[][][] getGrid()
      returns the grid
      int getMargin()
      returns the space between each rectangle in the grid
      int getNumBombs()
      returns the total number of bombs in the grid
      int getRectHeight()
      returns the height of one rectangle in the grid
      int getRectWidth()
      returns the width of one rectangle in the grid
      int getRows()
      returns the number of rows in the grid

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TheGrid

        public TheGrid(int r,
       int c,
       int nb,
       int m)
        Create the grid and randomly place given number of bombs in the grid.
        The maximum number of bombs is (r*c)/4
        Parameters:
        r - the number of rows for the grid
        c - the number of columns for the grid
        nb - the number of bombs to find
        m - the space between individual rectangles

      • TheGrid

        public TheGrid()
        The default constructor
        Will create a 5x4 grid with 5 bombs and a margin of 5 pixels between the rectangles
